title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When selecting one after advice statement in the cross reference view, all joinpoints for both after advice statements are displayed.
EB: When selecting one after advice statement in the cross reference view, only the joinpoints assigned to that specific after advice should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open and perform a clean compile on the attached project. 
2. Open the xref view. 
3. Select line 22 and note that you see 5 joinpoints (there should only be 3). 
4. Select line 68 and note that you see zero joinpoints (there should be 2 here). 
5. Right-click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises'. Note that all 5 joinpoints are displayed. 
6. Right-click the marker at line 22 and choose 'advises'. Note that all 5 joinpoints are displayed.
